name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Shooter
description:
First person shooter with Rock-Paper-Scissors game mechanic!

You have two hands, each can carry a sign. Left hand is used for attack, right for defense.

Enemies has only one sign. This sign is used both for attack and defense.

If you attack enemy using stronger sign (e.g. attack sign is scissors, enemy sign is paper) enemy will receive maximum damage. If signs are equal the damage will be lower. If you attack enemy using weaker sign, there will be no damage at all.

Control

WASD -walk

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot

Q - Change attack sign

E - Change Defense Sign
